programme.title: Second Sight Paranormal
programme.sub-title: Phantom of the Rink
programme.desc: The Landmark Skate & Fun Center was abandoned years ago. But it may have a ghost-only skate after hours with nightly paranormal activity. Second Sight investigates the spirit of a child that may linger on the rink that may just contact them.

programme.title: Cryptid Wilds S01 E04
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: The search for Big Foot takes these two adventures into the wilderness, as they document their journey to find the mythological creature

programme.title: Paranormal Investigator
programme.sub-title: CALL OUT Paranormal Investigation | HELPING A Family
programme.desc: Danny Moss is one of the leading names in the UK paranormal field. The Paranormal Investigator documents Danny's own personal joruney into the paranormal as he attempts to document compelling evidence on camera. Danny's investigation style is based on capturing both visual & audible results, he does not believe in the use of 'spiritual' or 'easily manipulated' techniques such as Ouija Boards, Table Tipping, Mediums, Pendulums, Dowsing Rods, Mirror Scrying etc...This show is for viewers who are willing to be patient and who understand the true values of paranormal investigation. More often than not, paranormal phenomena does not occurr and Danny's ethics and reputation will ensure that what you see is a TRUE reflection of the investigations conducted.

programme.title: Encounters
programme.sub-title: Margam Castle Part 2
programme.desc: Jason continues the investigation at the haunted Margam Castle, delving into the history and ghostly tales surrounding this magnificent Gothic Structure!

programme.title: Paranormal Unexplained
programme.sub-title: Most Terrifying Paranormal Activity Caught On Camera - Part 2
programme.desc: We revisit this abandoned haunted coroners court! What we captured and heard was the most terrifying poltergeist activity caught on camera!

programme.title: Paranormal Unexplained
programme.sub-title: Our Night Of Terror In Haunted Mill
programme.desc: In tonight's episode, we head out to investigate The Hauntings of Warwick Mill, where it's been reported that people who venture inside end up running out in fear due to the paranormal activity within.

programme.title: Second Sight Paranormal
programme.sub-title: Phantom of the Rink
programme.desc: The Landmark Skate & Fun Center was abandoned years ago. But it may have a ghost-only skate after hours with nightly paranormal activity. Second Sight investigates the spirit of a child that may linger on the rink that may just contact them.

programme.title: Aliens Uncovered
programme.sub-title: Aliens Uncovered: The Golden Record Part 3
programme.desc: In the late 1970s, the US government sent a message to our distant neighbors. Twenty years later, the response we received sparked the biggest UFO sighting in history.

programme.title: Conspiracy
programme.sub-title: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Conspiracy is a video documentary series that explores the dark and controversial stories behind history's most well-known conspiracies. The series aims to take a neutral position on very polarizing topics while helping viewers uncover the truth.

programme.title: Unveiled
programme.sub-title: Are Aliens Hiding in Plain Sight?
programme.desc: Embark on an enthralling journey with "Unveiled," a captivating TV series exploring the enigmatic world of aliens, UFOs, conspiracy theories, and extraterrestrial history. Each episode unveils astonishing encounters, hidden truths, and thought-provoking revelations that challenge reality itself. Discover a thrilling blend of scientific exploration, historical analysis, and captivating storytelling as "Unveiled" pushes the boundaries of human understanding and leaves audiences captivated by the mysteries of the universe.

programme.title: Is It Haunted?
programme.sub-title: Heskin Hall Shopping Village - Part 1
programme.desc: This is part 1 of the teams investigation into Heskin Hall Shopping Village. Right from the get go, the team uncovered some interesting evidence. So much so one of the members couldn't make it through the night.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.sub-title: 9/11 What Hit The Pentagon?
programme.desc: Richard meets several members of the 9/11 Truth movement who challenge the official version of events concerning the attack on the U.S. Pentagon on September 11, 2001. Researchers present evidence to suggest the attack was perpetrated by some rogue element inside the U.S. government. Was it really American Airlines Flight 77 that slammed into the west wall of the Pentagon? Was it a Tomahawk missile? Was it a bomb placed inside the building?

programme.title: Ghost Dimension
programme.sub-title: Sands Lake Secrets: Paranormal Mysteries
programme.desc: Explore paranormal phenomena at Sands Lake – from mysterious voices to ghostly encounters. The secrets of this haunting location are unveiled.

programme.title: Mind Control Exposed
programme.sub-title: Mind Control Exposed - Part1
programme.desc: In the remote reaches of the Alaskan North Slope lies a place of scientific intrigue and controversy: HAARP, which ventures into the realm of mind control, utilizing high frequency signals to influence behavior. But beyond Earthly boundaries, the conversation expands. Could extraterrestrial beings hold the key to unlocking the mysteries of the mind?

programme.title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds
programme.sub-title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds Episode 1
programme.desc: From astral projection to out of body experiences, the Astral world has been an endless source of wonder and mystery. From ancient knowledge to present day religious and spiritual beliefs, astral projection is both magical and misunderstood. What do we know? Where do we go from here? Find out in this new documentary exploring the other side of reality, it's Astral Worlds.

programme.title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds
programme.sub-title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds Episode 2
programme.desc: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds presents a Sci-Fi And Fantasy documentary examining the world of Astral Projection.

programme.title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds
programme.sub-title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds Episode 3
programme.desc: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds presents a Sci-Fi And Fantasy documentary examining Aura and the human energy body.

programme.title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds
programme.sub-title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds Episode 4
programme.desc: A psychic is a person who claims to use extrasensory perception (ESP) to identify information hidden from the normal senses. This documentary examines this history and practices of psychics including psychokinesis.

programme.title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds
programme.sub-title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds Episode 5
programme.desc: Reincarnation explores the idea that the soul or non-physical essence of a living being begins a new life in a different physical form or body after biological death. This documentary explores the ancient history of reincarnation.

programme.title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds
programme.sub-title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds Episode 6
programme.desc: The supernatural is referred to as phenomena or entities that are not subject to the laws of nature. This documentary examines the history and practices associated with the Supernatural.

programme.title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds
programme.sub-title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds Episode 7
programme.desc: This documentary explores the idea of transformation and how different cultures have interpreted the concept throughout time. Take a look into something truly transformational in Avatars Of The Astral Worlds: Transformation.

programme.title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds
programme.sub-title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds Episode 8
programme.desc: Science fiction or sci-fi is a genre of speculative fiction which typically deals with imaginative and futuristic concepts such as advanced science and technology. A fan favorite, this documentary explores science fiction and some of the crazy and genius ideas that have come out of it.

programme.title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds
programme.sub-title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds Episode 9
programme.desc: Alectromancy, clairvoyance, cartomancy. Straight out of folkloristic practices of Renaissance magic, this documentary explores the practice of predicting information about a person's life. Gaze into the crystal ball for answers about the ancient art of fortune-telling.

programme.title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds
programme.sub-title: Avatars Of The Astral Worlds Episode 10
programme.desc: Spirit photography — also called ghost photography — is a type of photography whose primary goal is to capture images of ghosts and other spiritual entities. This documentary examines the incredible history of spirit photography.
